text: Glenn Florio (January 26, 1967 - October 26, 2020) was an American rower. He competed in the men's double sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. Florio died of a heart attack on October 26, 2020 at the age of 53. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Glenn Florio
